attributes.action: to stem the tide of obesity, like smoking, i propose that we should ban burger eating in public places and the workplace.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it has worked with smoking. obese poeple would think twice about buying burgers, if they could not eat there burger straight away, and had to take it all the way home to eat it, as it would have gone cold and stale. it might encourage them to buy a salad instead. this would help take the strain off the health service.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
